Name: Lot'zAmonsters
About the game: 20 Weapons From the basic machinegun to a saw launcher each weapon is designed to be fun to use and unique 8 Kinds of monsters Each one presenting a diferent kind of challenge 30 Skills to choose from Making strategy more than just shooting 4 Levels Each one giving a diferent vibe with its own music theme Local Co-op Enjoy the game with a friend (only avaliable using an XBOX 360/ONE controller)
